==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|苧|物}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=まもの|苧|tr1=ma|t1=ramie|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}. The ''ma'' reading for {{ja-l|苧}} is non-standard, as ''mamono'' likely referred originally to [[hempen]] rope or cord, as indicated by the spelling {{ja-l|麻物}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ma̠mo̞no̞]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|まもの}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|sort=まもの|麻物|dot=:}} a [[rope]] or [[cord]] made from [[hemp]] or [[ramie]] [[fiber]]s
#: This spelling can be used to indicate a rope or cord made specifically from ramie.
